title: Flawed Forecasts: The Unraveling of Predictive Policing Software Geolitica
description: For over a decade, law enforcement agencies have turned to predictive policing software, hoping to harness the power of artificial intelligence (AI) in their battle against crime. These software promised a future where police could anticipate and prevent crimes before they occurred, much like the premise of Philip K. Dick’s “Minority Report.” However, a recent ... Read more

title: One in Ten Chatbot Users Are Big Time Horndogs, Researchers Find
description: In a revealing study, researchers have delved into the world of chatbot interactions and uncovered a not-so-surprising statistic: approximately one in ten people who engage with chatbots do so for erotic purposes. This eye-opening research, based on 100,000 real-world conversations, offers a unique glimpse into the varied and sometimes risqué world of human-bot interactions. In ... Read more

title: Iris Energy expands mining capabilities ahead of Bitcoin halving
description: As the highly anticipated Bitcoin “halving” event looms just six months away, Iris Energy, a Canada-based Bitcoin mining company, is making significant strides to boost its mining capabilities. On Friday, the company confirmed a substantial increase in its total hashrate, surging by 25% from 5.6 exahashes per second (EH/s) to 7.0 EH/s. This expansion was ... Read more

title: Federal Reserve believes we need more interest rate hikes
description: The whisperings from the corridors of the Federal Reserve are growing louder, hinting towards a shift in the economic winds. Michelle Bowman, a Governor at the Federal Reserve, has been clear about her perspective regarding the nation’s financial health: inflation is stubbornly high. This view, not isolated to Bowman alone, places the Federal Reserve on ... Read more

title: Google AI Lead: “Don’t take trading advice from ChatGPT” | Interview
description: ChatGPT and trading bots are on the rise, but can you trust their recommendations? Laurence Moroney, AI Lead at Google, discusses the intersection of AI and web3 in an exclusive interview.

title: SIM-Swap Scandal: Scammer Siphons $385K from FriendTech Users
description: A single scammer pilfered $385K in Ethereum by SIM-swapping four FriendTech users within 24 hours. FriendTech’s surge in popularity has made its users a prime target for such cyber-attacks. In a shocking revelation, FriendTech, the rapidly growing crypto-social platform, finds itself entangled in a security breach – not at the platform’s level but at its [...]
